summary: Sansa Stark's Statue in season 8
body:
Sansa Stark’s Statue in season 8

What is this I’m hearing about Sansa stark getting a statue in S8. Correct me if I’m wrong but isn’t statues made for like dead people in GoT 😥😥😥😥. Sophie mentioned it in her NYCC. Apparently NaughtSansa posted this on Twitter. If you are on her NS, please can you elaborate?

What does everyone else think?

summary:
Sansa Week | Day 2: Color
"(Blue) is one of trust, responsibility, honesty and loyalty. It is sincere, reserved and quiet, and...
body:
Sansa Week | Day 2: Color

“(Blue) is one of trust, responsibility, honesty and loyalty. It is sincere, reserved and quiet, and doesn’t like to make a fuss or draw attention. It hates confrontation, and likes to do things in its own way.

…

This color exhibits an inner security and confidence.

…

You can rely on it to take control and do the right thing in difficult times.

…

This is a color that seeks peace and tranquility above everything else.”

“(Blue) is one of trust, responsibility, honesty and loyalty. It is sincere, reserved and quiet, and doesn’t like to make a fuss or draw attention. It hates confrontation, and likes to do things in its own way.

summary: Little Bard
title: Little Bard
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2ynbF3Z

by SuchaHag

A bard receives a generous gift.

Words: 297, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Game of Thrones (TV), A Song of Ice and Fire - George R. R. Martin

summary: Sansa Week Day 2: Family "There was always a singer at Evenfall Hall when I was a girl," Brienne said quietly. "I learned all...
caption:
Sansa Week Day 2: Family

“There was always a singer at Evenfall Hall when I was a girl,” Brienne said quietly. “I learned all the songs by heart.”

“Sansa did the same, though few singers ever cared to make the long journey north to Winterfell.” I told her there would be singers at the king’s court, though. I told her she would hear music of all sorts, that her father could find some master to help her learn the high harp. Oh, gods forgive me…

reblog.comment:
Sansa Week Day 2: Family

I told her she would hear music of all sorts, that her father could find some master to help her learn the high harp. Oh, gods forgive me…

“There was always a singer at Evenfall Hall when I was a girl,” Brienne said quietly. “I learned all the songs by heart.”

I told her she would hear music of all sorts, that her father could find some master to help her learn the high harp. Oh, gods forgive me…

summary:
Sansa Stark Week - Day 2/7: Color  
Her hair was a rich autumn auburn... /
Sansa wore a gown of silvery satin trimmed invair,...
caption:
Sansa Stark Week - Day 2/7: Color

Her hair was a rich autumn auburn… / Sansa wore a gown of silvery satin trimmed invair, with dagged sleeves that almost touched the floor… (…) Tyrion had never seen her look more lovely, yet she wore sorrow on those long satin sleeves.
